## Interactive Session 3B

## Vectors

###  Create and store the vector

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", "4", "yellow")
class(marmots)

# create and store numeric vector
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.5)
class(pika)

# create amd stoore interger vector 
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)
class(bear)

```

### Vector addition and subtraction, scalar multiplier, and dot product

```{r}

# creating new vectors 
ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

#perform vector math
ringtail + fox
ringtail - fox
100 * ringtail # scalar multiplication 
ringtail %*% fox # % tells are to do the dot product
```
